tasks.label: Process input videos
args: $workspace = "${workspaceFolder}"; $inputDir = Join-Path $workspace 'video_subtitles\inputs'; $script = Join-Path $workspace 'video_subtitles\main.py'; Get-ChildItem -Path $inputDir -File -Include *.mp4,*.mov,*.mkv,*.m4a,*.3gp,*.3g2 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort-Object FullName | ForEach-Object { Write-Host ("Processing " + $_.FullName); python $script $_.FullName }
